# StringUtility.EndsWith method

Determines whether a string ends with the specified character.

```csharp
public static bool EndsWith(this string source, char value)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| source | The string. |
| value | The character. |

## Return Value

`true` if the last character in the string is *value*; `false` otherwise.
